column4: I have the same problem. My boot grub is filled up with old kernels, though I have disabled display in menu.lst.
what I meant is that maybe I could use those kernels for doing something
I always keep some old kernels; they may be useful (for example YouTube videos worked much better on 2.6.24-19 than on 2.6.24-21)
usually a later kernel supports all oldies? Why then retain them?
